properties.name: Action
properties.description: The API action that grants access to the layer.

type.description: The API action that grants access to the layer.

properties.name: LayerVersionArn
properties.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the layer.

type.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the layer.

properties.name: OrganizationId
properties.description: With the principal set to *, grant permission to all accounts in the specified organization.

type.description: With the principal set to *, grant permission to all accounts in the specified organization.

properties.name: Principal
properties.description: An account ID, or * to grant layer usage permission to all accounts in an organization, or all AWS accounts (if organizationId is not specified).

type.description: An account ID, or * to grant layer usage permission to all accounts in an organization, or all AWS accounts (if organizationId is not specified).
